title: FERRIS | Large Conditioned 4-in-1 Leather Surface Wipes | Fresh Scented Leather Wipes Removes Dirt with Protecting the Surface | Multi-purpose Use Gives Surfaces an Original Finish [Pack of 140]
features: 𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗜𝗨𝗠 𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗛𝗘𝗥 𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗘 : Our leather conditioning wipes are designed to provide superior care for all types of leather goods. Each wipe is infused with high-quality conditioning agents that nourish and rejuvenate leather, restoring its natural luster and extending its lifespan. Perfect for use on leather furniture, car interiors, shoes, bags, and more.

𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗩𝗘𝗡𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗬 𝗧𝗢 𝗨𝗦𝗘 : These leather conditioning wipes are pre-moistened and ready to use straight out of the package, making leather care quick and hassle-free. Simply wipe down your leather items to clean and condition them in one easy step. The compact packaging ensures the wipes stay moist and are convenient to store and carry, ideal for use at home, in the car, or on the go.

𝗗𝗘𝗘𝗣 𝗖𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗡𝗦𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗔𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 : Our wipes not only condition but also effectively remove dirt, dust, and grime from leather surfaces. The gentle formula cleans without stripping the leather of its natural oils or causing damage, leaving your leather looking clean, fresh, and well-maintained. Ideal for regular upkeep to keep your leather goods in pristine condition.

𝗦𝗔𝗙𝗘 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗡𝗢𝗡-𝗧𝗢𝗫𝗜𝗖 𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗠𝗨𝗟𝗔 : Formulated with non-toxic, gentle ingredients, our leather conditioning wipes are safe for use on all leather types. They are free from harsh chemicals that can harm leather or irritate skin, making them suitable for regular use. Trust our wipes to provide a safe and effective solution for maintaining the beauty of your leather items.

𝗘𝗡𝗛𝗔𝗡𝗖𝗘𝗗 𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗛𝗘𝗥 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 : Our leather conditioning wipes provide a protective barrier that helps shield leather from future damage. The conditioning agents form a layer that guards against stains, spills, and UV damage, ensuring your leather items stay in top condition for longer. This added protection makes our wipes a smart choice for maintaining and preserving your valuable leather goods.

⚠️ When using our leather surface wipes, it's important to follow the instructions carefully and to test a small, inconspicuous area of the leather first to make sure that the wipes won't cause any damage or discoloration. It's also a good idea to use a separate wipe for each leather item to avoid transferring dirt or oils from one surface to another.
description: Product Description FERRIS | Large Conditioned 4-in-1 Leather Surface Wipes | Fresh Scented Leather Wipes Removes Dirt & Grime with Protecting the Surface [140 Wipes] Our Leather Surface Cleaning Wipes are Disposable Cleaning Cloths which are pre-moisturized that are designed to clean and protect leather and leather surfaces. Our Wipes are pre-moistened with a cleaning solution that is safe and effective for use on all types of leather. Our Leather Surface Wipes can be used to clean a variety of leather goods, including furniture, car seats, jackets, shoes, and handbags.
